preceding: Anonymous access to a closed arbitration archive with hints of internal and external threats.
dilemma: Karina must decide between investigating a foreign cyber-espionage threat or exposing internal sabotage within the BCI.
reason: Both paths promise to unveil critical threats, but pursuing one might leave the other unchecked, affecting Stenograd's security.
choice_a: Karina chooses to pursue the investigation into foreign cyber-espionage targeting the BCI.
choice_b: Karina decides to delve into the internal sabotage, aiming to bring internal flaws to light.
